text: ## N. DETAILS OF FINANCING ARRANGEMENTS

The Promoters, members of the Promoter Group, the directors of the issuer and their relatives have not financed the purchase by any other person of securities of our Company other than in the normal course of the business of the financing entity during the period of six months immediately preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.

## S. PRE- IPO PLACEMENT
Our Company does not contemplate any issuance or placement of Equity Shares from the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus until the listing of the Equity Shares.
## T. ISSUE OF SHARES FOR CONSIDERATION OTHER THAN CASH IN LAST ONE YEAR
Except as set out below, our Company has not issued any equity shares for consideration other than cash during the last one year preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
